title: Did Rahul Meet People of Amethi After Loss in LS Polls?
subtitle: Fact Check: A video has gone viral saying that People of Amethi reached Delhi to meet Rahul Gandhi, after losing the election. However, the video is old from Raebareli when NTPC explosion took place.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral video is doing rounds on the social media with the claim, “अमेठी के लोग राहुल गाँधी से मिलने दिल्ली पहुँचे,अमेठी में चुनाव हारने के बाद राहुल से मिलते ही लोग अपने आँखों के आंसू नहीं रोक पाये.”

In the video, Congress President Rahul Gandhi can be seen consoling an old woman in the middle of a crowd.
